name: Pop Star Dentist
description:
Be a Dentist, be a Pop Star Dentist!

Pop Stars go to the Dentist too!

As a dentist to the stars you get to take good care of your COOLEST patients!

The fun includes

- Tooth decay
- Bad breath
- Shine up those celebrity teeth
- CRAZY tools
- Sparkling GRILLZ
- Take photos
- Share on Facebook

Become a Dentist. Don't get too crazy. Have a Blast!
